about.summary: 'IUCN' Red List (<http://apiv3.iucnredlist.org/api/v3/docs>) client. The 'IUCN' Red List is a global list of threatened and endangered species. Functions cover all of the Red List 'API' routes. An 'API' key is required.

'IUCN' Red List (<http://apiv3.iucnredlist.org/api/v3/docs>) client. The 'IUCN' Red List is a global list of threatened and endangered species. Functions cover all of the Red List 'API' routes. An 'API' key is required.

name: r-rredlist
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.1.0" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-rredlist
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/rredlist_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/rredlist/rredlist_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: ddb8b379be01be3ae10332d124676619991e1b28b237124b91257395a58ff04d

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-cli
    - r-crul >=0.3.8
    - r-curl
    - r-jsonlite >=1.1
    - r-lifecycle
    - r-rlang
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-cli
    - r-crul >=0.3.8
    - r-curl
    - r-jsonlite >=1.1
    - r-lifecycle
    - r-rlang

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('rredlist')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('rredlist')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/ropensci/rredlist
  license: MIT
  summary: "'IUCN' Red List (<http://apiv3.iucnredlist.org/api/v3/docs>) client. The 'IUCN' Red List is a global list of threatened and endangered species. Functions cover all of the Red List 'API' routes. An 'API' key is required."
  license_family: MIT
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/MIT'
    - LICENSE

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - ocefpaf

# Package: rredlist
# Type: Package
# Title: 'IUCN' Red List Client
# Description: 'IUCN' Red List (<http://apiv3.iucnredlist.org/api/v3/docs>) client. The 'IUCN' Red List is a global list of threatened and endangered species. Functions cover all of the Red List 'API' routes. An 'API' key is required.

# License: MIT + file LICENSE
